description:
When Keroro hits on a new way to slack off, Giroro gets to take command of the invasion plans for a day. He orders an expensive, powerful weapon but isn`t thrilled when it goes haywire and tries to vaporize Natsumi. Later, Giroro takes the lead in another strategy, sending phone texts to Natsumi and then leaving her in anxious suspense by suddenly cutting her off. Except it doesn`t quite play out that way...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Giroro, Pekopon Invasion Starts / Giroro & Natsumi, Operation Cell Phone Mail
ギロロ ペコポン侵略開始! / ギロロ&夏美 携帯メール作戦
